name: Kessis Adventures
description:
DEMO: Kessis Adventure - save your friends, save the world!

This game has a gravel hook, mini gun, vampires, mummies, cleopatra, double-jump, rockets, sand simulation, ... Everything you need! :-)

Start: KessisAdventures.exe

Be sure to have a game pad installed! Otherwise it just will not start.

This is just a demo with 5 representative levels.

Have fun and let me know your comments on it! :-)

-------------------------------------

Started with a blank C++ project in VisualStudio, I just used SFML as multimedia library. 

Verlet integration maths used as base for physics.

Title music (played on the keyboard myself, I can't read music notes) is a reference to 'Back to the Future' as popular movie when we were teenagers

Free sprites and graphics gratefully taken from https://opengameart.org/

Free sounds gratefully taken from https://freesound.org/
